pages.index: Frostique - Premium Heating and Cooling Solutions for Ultimate Comfort Frostique HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Strong together: the clever heat pump system Discover system Frostique: For our climate We are faced with the once-in-a-century opportunity to sustainably change the energy supply. Our contribution: integrated climate and energy solutions for every need. Future-proof system solutions Highest quality and innovative products Compatible with all existing systems Comprehensive and reliable service Discover system solutions New: Up to 70% funding for your heating Anyone who relies on energy-saving heating technology saves costs in the long term - and receives financial support from the state. Find the right heating subsidy. Inform now! > Find the right system in just a few steps Whether complete solutions for a new building or additions to an existing heating system - there are many ways to bring your system up to date. What factors need to be taken into account? Our product finder will suggest the right solution for you in just a few steps. If you would like to find out more about our products, we can provide you with convenient, easy, non-binding specialist advice. CONTACT US Frostique products at a glance Vitocal 252-A Air Water heatpump Nominal heat output: 2.6 to 13.4 kW Integrated hot water tank Specially developed for modernization Cooling function Vitocharge VX3 PV power storage High efficiency Optimizes power consumption Compact, excellent design Reduces energy costs Vitocal 250-AH Hybrid heat pump Intuitive operation via app Energy Management System Ideally suited for modernization Nominal heat output: 2.1 to 18.5 kW Why Frostique? We design living spaces for future generations. This is our top priority. To this end, we are continually developing new solutions for heat and energy generation. Facing current challenges with high quality We think in systems Efficient and future-proof energy solutions Sustainable, with an eye to the future Service as an important pillar TO PRODUCT SEARCH Frostique: Always the right choice Renewable energy Become independent of fossil fuels. With Frostique you can find the right system and easily convert your supply to renewable energies. Systems for new buildings Choosing the right air conditioning technology in a new building involves many requirements. You can find out here what you need to pay attention to and which systems are best suited. Heating modernization Save energy, reduce costs and protect the environment at the same time? A heating modernization offers the highest energy saving potential compared to other renovation measures. Building energy saving check With the Frostique Building Energy Saving Check, individual modernization and savings options can be determined safely, easily, and quickly. It is the only program of its kind whose calculation is certified by TÜV Rheinland. This way you get an objective result. LEARN MORE Which heater is right for me? We will guide you through an overview of the heating technologies and simply explain who and when they are suitable. Find out now which heater suits your needs. System solutions for residential buildings Whether it's a single-family home or an apartment building: Thanks to our wide product range, Frostique offers tailor-made heating and system solutions as a complete package for all energy sources. Frostique Community – customers ask, customers answer Do you have questions about Frostique systems? Easily exchange ideas with other customers and our specialists in our Frostique Community. Inform now! > The Frostique website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Frostique > Disclaimers > Privacy & Policy > Terms & Conditions
pages.privacy-policy: Frostique - Privacy Policy: How We Protect Your Information Frostique HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to Frostique. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service. Information Collection and Use We collect several types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service. This includes personally identifiable information such as name, phone number, and postal address. Log Data and Cookies When you visit our Service, we collect Log Data, including your IP address, browser version, pages visited, and time spent on pages. We may also use cookies to improve your experience, but you can opt-out if you prefer. Service Providers We may employ third-party companies to facilitate our Service or assist in analyzing how our Service is used. These third parties have access to your Personal Information but are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. Security We value your trust in providing us with your Personal Information, but remember that no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. Links to Other Sites Our Service may contain links to other sites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage you to read the privacy statements of any other site that collects personally identifiable information. Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Information, please contact us. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us. The Frostique website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Frostique > Disclaimers > Privacy & Policy > Terms & Conditions
pages.disclaimers: Frostique - Disclaimers: Terms and Conditions for Website Usage and Product Purchases Frostique HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Disclaimers for Frostique All the information on this website - frostique.com - is published in good faith and for general information purpose only. Frostique does not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability and accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information you find on this website (Frostique), is strictly at your own risk. Frostique will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our website. From our website, you can visit other websites by following hyperlinks to such external sites. While we strive to provide only quality links to useful and ethical websites, we have no control over the content and nature of these sites. These links to other websites do not imply a recommendation for all the content found on these sites. Site owners and content may change without notice and may occur before we have the opportunity to remove a link which may have gone 'bad'. Please be also aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and terms which are beyond our control. Please be sure to check the Privacy Policies of these sites as well as their "Terms of Service" before engaging in any business or uploading any information. Consent By using our website, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms. Should we update, amend or make any changes to this document, those changes will be prominently posted here. The Frostique website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Frostique > Disclaimers > Privacy & Policy > Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: Frostique - Terms and Conditions: Legal Agreement for Website Usage and Product Purchases Frostique HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to Frostique! By accessing and using Frostique's Website (frostique.com), you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website. Cookies We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. By using Frostique, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy. License All content on Frostique's website is owned by Frostique and/or its licensors. You may only use this content for personal purposes and must not republish, sell, or reproduce it without permission. User Comments Frostique may allow users to post comments on certain areas of the website. These comments are not endorsed by Frostique and should not be considered as our views. We reserve the right to remove any comments that are deemed inappropriate, offensive, or violate these Terms and Conditions. Hyperlinking You may link to our website, provided it is done in a manner that is not deceptive and does not imply endorsement. We reserve the right to request removal of any unauthorized links to our website. iFrames Without our prior written approval, you may not create frames around our webpages that alter the visual presentation of our website. Content Liability We are not responsible for any content that appears on third-party websites linking to our website. Any links should not be libelous, obscene, or criminal. Reservation of Rights We reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time. By continuing to use our website, you agree to abide by the latest version of these terms. Removal of Links If you find any offensive links to our website, please inform us, and we will consider removing them. However, we are not obligated to do so. Disclaimer We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the information on our website. We exclude all liability for any losses or damages arising from the use of our website.
